QuestData.Title: Grimtotem Chiefs: Elder Stormhoof
QuestData.Description: Elder Stormhoof is a shaman of immense power. Supposedly, he is a direct disciple of Magatha Grimtotem, the Elder Crone, leader of the Grimtotem clan.$B$BWe know that he's here and that he's been training their geomancers. We have to kill him, $c.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Beware his mastery of the elements!
QuestData.RewardText: That's two of them. Two more to go.$B$BI wonder what he meant about being "chosen"?
